member.name: T:Stimulsoft.Report.MvcMobile.JSON
member.summary:
This class encodes and decodes JSON strings. http://www.json.org/
JSON uses Arrays and Objects. These correspond here to the datatypes ArrayList and Hashtable. All numbers are parsed to doubles.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.MvcMobile.JSON.Decode(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the string json into a value
member.returns: An ArrayList, a Hashtable, a double, a string, null, true, or false

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.MvcMobile.JSON.Decode(System.String,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Parses the string json into a value; and fills 'success' with the successfullness of the parse.
member.returns: An ArrayList, a Hashtable, a double, a string, null, true, or false

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.MvcMobile.JSON.Encode(System.Object)
member.summary: Converts a Hashtable / ArrayList object into a JSON string
member.returns: A JSON encoded string, or null if object 'json' is not serializable

member.summary: Gets or sets the action method name of preparing the rendered report.

member.summary: Gets or sets the action method name of the report viewer event (change report page, set zoom or view mode).

member.summary: Gets or sets the action method name of printing a report.

member.summary: Gets or sets the action method name of exporting a report to the required format.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.MvcMobile.StiMvcMobileViewerOptions.ServerTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates how much time do the report rendering result will be stored in the server cache or session.

member.summary: Gets or sets the mode of the report caching.

member.summary: Specifies the relative priority of report, stored in the system cache.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates that the viewer will use relative or absolute URLs.

member.summary: Gets or sets a count columns in parameters panel.

member.summary: Gets or sets a max height parameters panel.

member.summary: Gets or sets a path to the localization file for the web viewer.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value which controls of output objects in the right to left mode.
